It is well known fact that in Anabaena, N-fixation occurred in heterocyst whereas authors tried to prove N-fixing ability in vegetative cells of Anabaena sp. strain PCC 7120 by using transcriptome analysis, however, a simple test i.e. Acetylene Reduction Assay (ARA) and nifH-PCR could be a better option for preliminary screening which are missing in this study. Please provide these data.
